strings.platforms.unique_extensions_description: When determining the platform of a ROM or image (which is later used when determining the game title), only the "Unique File Extensions" are used. All other extensions are ignored as they will limit the ability of Gaseous to determine the game title (see {0} for more information on how matching works).
strings.platforms.list_prepopulated_description: This list is pre-populated with some of the more common platforms. New platforms will appear in this list as titles are added.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_enable_descripti: Enable two-factor authentication for added security.
strings.accountmodal.enter_code_label: Enter the code from your authenticator app:
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_confirmation_ent: Please enter the confirmation code from your authenticator app.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_confirmation_inv: The confirmation code is invalid or expired. Please try again.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_enabled_message: 2FA has been successfully enabled for your account.
strings.accountmodal.recovery_codes_fetch_failed: Couldn't fetch your recovery codes. Please try again later.
strings.accountmodal.recovery_codes_store_codes_: Store these codes in a safe place. They can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. They are one-time use only, and never shown again.
strings.accountmodal.recovery_codes_none_returne: No recovery codes were returned. Please try again later.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_setup_generate_k: Couldn't generate a 2FA key. Please try again later.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_setup_generic_un: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_disable_confirm: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA? This will remove the extra security layer from your account.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_disable_failed_e: The 2FA disable failed. Please try again later.
strings.accountmodal.two_factor_disabled_message: 2FA has been successfully disabled for your account.
strings.accountmodal.username_change_requirement: The new username does not meet the requirements.
strings.accountmodal.username_change_failed_erro: The username change failed. Try a different username.
strings.accountmodal.password_reset_requirements: The new password does not meet the requirements.
strings.accountmodal.password_reset_failed_error: The password reset failed. Check the current password and try again.
strings.accountmodal.username_rule_valid_charact: Only letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, periods, and at signs
strings.gameromsmodal.no_roms_message: There are no ROMs associated with this game and platform.

strings.preferencesmodal.section.preferred_title: Preferred Title and Cover Art Region
strings.uploadrommodal.instructions: Upload ROMs by dragging and dropping them here, or by clicking here.
strings.webemulatormodal.emulatorjs_description: The EmulatorJS web emulator is a web-based emulator that allows you to run various retro systems in your browser. For more information, see the project home page at
strings.webemulatormodal.more_information_cores_: for more information regarding EmulatorJS cores.
strings.webemulatormodal.bios_files_available_he: BIOS Files Available when Running the Emulator
strings.first2page.signatures_description: Signatures are used to match a ROM to a game name using the hash of the ROM (MD5 or SHA1). For more information, see the
strings.first2page.signature.hasheous_label: Hasheous is a community-driven project that provides a database of ROM hashes and game names. It is the most accurate and up-to-date source of signatures.
strings.first2page.signature.localonly_label: Local Only uses the signatures that are stored in the Gaseous database. This is the default option and is useful if you are not connected to the internet.
strings.first2page.metadata_description: Metadata is used to provide additional information about a game, such as the release date, publisher, and genre. For more information, see the
strings.first2page.metadata.igdb_label: IGDB is a community-driven project that provides a database of game metadata. It is the most accurate and up-to-date source of metadata.
strings.first2page.metadata.thegamesdb_label: The Games DB is a community-driven project that provides a database of game metadata. It is a good alternative to IGDB.
strings.first2page.metadata.none_label: None disables metadata retrieval. This is useful if you do not want to use metadata or are not connected to the internet.
